name: Stone Cursed
languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Cunning Opportunist
entries: The stone cursed has advantage on the attack rolls of opportunity attacks.

traits.name: False Appearance
entries: While the stone cursed remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal statue.

actions.name: Petrifying Claws
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3 damage) slashing damage, or 14 (2d10 + 3 damage) slashing damage if the attack roll had advantage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, or it begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained} until the end of its next turn, when it must repeat the saving throw. The effect ends if the second save is successful; otherwise the target is {@condition petrified} for 24 hours.
